title: When the Heart Falls
description:
A heartwarming, suspenseful western romance about a down-on-her-luck divorcée and a small town cowboy who get a second chance at love …
After catching her husband with another woman, Misty Prescott calls it quits on her “perfect life” and runs home to her parents’ ranch. Finding comfort in her roots, Misty sets her heart on the promise of a renewed future but instead finds the past in the form of one devilishly handsome cowboy.When tragedy brings Dylan McCoy home to help save his family’s ranch, the last person he expects to see is the beautiful woman who branded his heart over a decade ago. But now that she's back—and newly single—he's determined to finally be a part of that life she's trying to put back together and prove to her that good men do exist.But when the truth behind Dylan’s homecoming is revealed, suddenly the best moments of their lives turn treacherous. Secrets go deep in the heart of Texas, and with deception and betrayal weaving into their newfound love, can Dylan and Misty fight the obstacles tempting to tear them apart—and survive the danger that threatens their very lives?
author: Kimberly  Lewis
